parameters: Sorry, I have no time to eat right now.
Hey there! How many of you are there?
Excuse me? What do you mean?
How many in your party? I need to know so
Oh, sorry. I am not here to eat actually.
I am looking for your boss.
Patty? She is in the back right now helping
cook. I could maybe get her for you, but
you are gonna have to do something for me.
Business has been a little slow lately, so
I am gonna ask you again and maybe you will
have a different answer this time. How many
I am here to talk to your boss.
Here is your table, as long as you are
ready to order, just let me know.
I am here to talk to your boss.
Ma’am I told you, I am not here to eat.
Slides money over discreetly. I am here to
talk to your boss, Patty, right?
What kind of person do you think I am? I
do not take bribes. We are a classy
restaurant, and you need to leave.
You just tried to blackmail me!
I really need to talk to Patty. It could be
a matter of life and death.
Maybe you should have thought of that
Alright, what can I get you?
The classic hamburger and a coke
Chicken sandwich and a talk with Patty
The classic hamburger and a coke
Umm…I will have the classic hamburger and a coke.
Thank you! Now is there an…
Your food will be out shortly. Let me know
if there is anything else you need.
Oh another table is calling, I’ll be back
Ok! Here is your food! Enjoy
Here is your check! Pleasure doing business
Well that was a complete waste of time.
Leave the restaurant, try to find Patty
Leave the restaurant, try to find Patty
I guess I might as well leave. Maybe there

building. I guess I will just have to wait
Well, I might as well try and go talk to her myself.
